Object 2079
Object ID:
2080
Title:
Chou Jing head
Description:
Chou Jing head. Chou Jing official. Black shamao hat sits forward on head; round fins. Flesh face with tatoo stripes in black and grey around fish style eye and red lips, teeth, tongue.
Notes:
Hinges on hat fins. Envelope #22 #3. Old object #2109.
Subjects:
Chou head
Dimensions:
H:

built with
